turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order three pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from which pizzeria?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium pizza meat lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three medium meat-lover pizzas with the thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me order that for you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any special requests for the pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like thick crust on my pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, ill add that for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want to dine-in or have it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it delivered, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, give me one moment to calculate the cost.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: oh i think you said you were going to pick-up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, let me give you the cost, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: it will cost $57 for 3 medium meat lover pizzas with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Then it's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your welcome, enjoy your pizzas.
